name: Magician's Valley Concept Demo
description:
Magician's Valley is an inmersive and atmospheric walking simulator in which we'll live the journey of a Magician through what will be his new life.

In this demo I'll show you the concept of Magician's Valley, so all the elements, sounds, models or even systems are not definitive.
For a better experience play in your free time and with headphones!

Here you have a link for a Google Form, where you can tell me how was your experience playing the demo through some short questions :)
https://goo.gl/forms/3HEwncSmYz1DJWek2

Thank you very much to all the people that help to make Magician's Valley a reality!

This is gona be amazing.

#BreakTheRoutine
